db:abstract.db:para: Provides access to a displayable area managed by the compositor.
This type was introduced in Qt 5.8.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: The WaylandOutput manages a rectangular area within bounds of the compositor's geometry, to use it for displaying client content. This could, for instance, be a screen managed by the WaylandCompositor.
The type corresponds to the wl_output interface in the Wayland protocol.

db:section.db:title: automaticFrameCallback : bool
db:section.db:para: This property holds whether the WaylandOutput automatically sends frame callbacks when rendering.
The default is true.

db:section.db:title: availableGeometry : rect
db:section.db:para: This property holds the geometry of the WaylandOutput available for displaying content. The available geometry is in output coordinates space, starts from 0,0 and it's as big as the output by default.

db:section.db:title: compositor : WaylandCompositor
db:section.db:para: This property holds the compositor displaying content on this WaylandOutput.

db:note.db:para: This property can be set only once, before the WaylandOutput component is completed.

db:section.db:title: geometry : rect
db:section.db:para: This property holds the geometry of the WaylandOutput.

db:section.db:title: manufacturer : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds a textual description of the manufacturer of this WaylandOutput.

db:section.db:title: model : string
db:section.db:para: This property holds a textual description of the model of this WaylandOutput.

db:section.db:title: physicalSize : size
db:section.db:para: This property holds the physical size of the WaylandOutput in millimeters.

db:section.db:title: position : point
db:section.db:para: This property holds the position of this WaylandOutput in the compositor's coordinate system.

db:section.db:title: scaleFactor : int
db:section.db:para: This property holds the factor by which the WaylandCompositor scales surface buffers before they are displayed. It is used on high density output devices where unscaled content would be too small to be practical. The client can in turn set the scale factor of its buffer to match the output if it prefers to provide high resolution content that is suitable for the output device.
The default is 1 (no scaling).

db:section.db:title: sizeFollowsWindow : bool
db:section.db:para: This property controls whether the size of the WaylandOutput matches the size of its window.
If this property is true, all modes previously added are replaced by a mode that matches window size and screen refresh rate.
The default is false.

db:section.db:title: subpixel : enum
db:section.db:para: This property holds the subpixel arrangement of this WaylandOutput.

db:listitem.db:para: WaylandOutput.SubpixelUnknown The subpixel arrangement is not set.
WaylandOutput.SubpixelHorizontalRgb The subpixels are arranged horizontally in red, green, blue order.
WaylandOutput.SubpixelHorizontalBgr The subpixels are arranged horizontally in blue, green, red order.
WaylandOutput.SubpixelVerticalRgb The subpixels are arranged vertically in red, green, blue order.
WaylandOutput.SubpixelVerticalBgr The subpixels are arranged vertically in blue, green, red order.

db:section.db:para: The default is WaylandOutput.SubpixelUnknown.

db:section.db:title: transform : enum
db:section.db:para: This property holds the transformation that the QWaylandCompositor applies to a surface to compensate for the orientation of the QWaylandOutput.

db:listitem.db:para: WaylandOutput.Transform90 The orientation is rotated 90 degrees.
WaylandOutput.Transform180 The orientation is rotated 180 degrees.
WaylandOutput.Transform270 The orientation is rotated 270 degrees.
WaylandOutput.TransformFlipped90 The orientation is mirrored, then rotated 90 degrees.
WaylandOutput.TransformFlipped180 The orientation is mirrored, then rotated 180 degrees.
WaylandOutput.TransformFlipped270 The orientation is mirrored, then rotated 270 degrees.

db:section.db:para: The default is WaylandOutput.TransformNormal.

db:section.db:title: window : Window
db:section.db:para: This property holds the Window for this WaylandOutput.

db:note.db:para: This property can be set only once, before the WaylandOutput component is completed.
